p: Important knowledge gaps remain regarding effects of climate and climate change on emergence of several vector-borne diseases in the world. Here, we provide detailed global maps of current potential distributions of Cx. quinquefasciatus, the potential vector for WNV, SLEV, and LF, and examine possible changes in the potential distribution of the species under future climatic conditions, based on outputs of 11 general circulation models (GCMs) and 4 representative concentration pathways (RCPs).
